name: A Project in Harmony
blurb: Through Knowledge You'll Seek. With Wisdom You'll Endure. Beside Belief You'll Conquer.

rewards.reward: Thank you so much for your help, our appreciation of your faith in us is unmatched, I assure you. For your contribution you will most definitely be credited.

You are too kind! For you, you shall reap all of the benefits of immortality without the hassle of taking a dip in a fountain. Your name will be chanted for ages, and you will get to see the proof with your own copy of the game at the time of availability. Should you choose otherwise, a cash amount matching the release price of the game shall be substituted.

An honorable gesture, we cannot thank you enough! This warrants you a special set of legendary items to aid you in your journey. The set will include a special mount, an epic set of armor, and legendary weapon.You will also be credited and will get a copy of the game at the time of release, plus any other content released at any point that relates to the game.

Excellent!! Your belief in our project is something we cherish with all of our hearts. To show you just how grateful we are we will work with you to design a dream world to be included in our waking world, where you will be given the right to design the environment and creatures, as well as special equipment in the form of a set of armor, a weapon, and an item that will be taken back into the waking world to carry with you on your adventures. The submissions can range from simple outlines describing how you see it, stick figure doodles, or complex concept art, and we will work with you to adapt it to fit into our game. You too will get the same Legendary set as the previous reward offered. You will also find a warm welcome as your name forever goes down as a bringer of hope into this world. You will also receive two copies of the game, one for you and one for a friend, and any content related to the game.

You, my friend, are a scholar and a gentleman, or gentlelady. I see true belief in your eyes, and for this your reward is monumental. Not only will you get your name shouted from the mountaintops, or have the items you've created come to life through one of the many dream worlds experienced in this realm, but you shall be given the honor to add a boss to your dream world. The boss you create will follow the same guidelines of the others in the sense where you can pick strengths, weaknesses, and any special ways to defeat them you can think of as long as they correlate with laws of the games universe. You too will get the same Legendary set as the previous rewards offered. On top of all this goodness, you will be given three copies of the game and all content related to the game.
